Contact Us

You can contact the Centre Management office on 07 5527 3799, Monday to Friday between the hours 8:30am to 5:00pm.
If you want to find out more about Nerang Mall, we’re here to help. Simply fill in your details below and we’ll be in touch shortly.

Keep up-to-date with the latest events

I agree to the privacy policy and wish to receive Nerang Mall's newsletter containing the latest news and offers.

 

We acknowledge and respect the traditional lands and cultures of the Yugambeh people, the Traditional Owners and Custodians of the Country on which Nerang Mall resides, and pay our respects to Elders past and present. We recognise First Nations peoples' longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
